CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 4, 1941, pg. 5, reads: "MERRY PARTY FOR MARIAN BANNISTER - Miss Louisa [?] Jeffries gave a party for her niece, Marian Lee Bannister, ten years old, last Friday afternoon. It was a great [...] for the youngsters.  Guests, sitting left to right: Vivian Jean Allen, Geraldine Jackson, Charmaine Jeffries, Joan Ryan, Marian Lee Bannister, Lucille Bertha, Imogene Nelson, Geraldine Smith.  Sitting on the couch left to right: Iris Scott, Carol Shepherd of Chicago, Marguerite Anderson, Dorothy Lou Sands, Jean Holland, Mary Eleanor Green.  Boys standing left to right: Gilbert Tyler Jr., Robert Lewis, Samuel Johnson Jr., Richard Reed, Thomas Everett Jr., LaRue Frederick, William Dorsey, James Bell, Donald Hudson, Byrd Brown, Charles E. Jackson Jr.  Not pictured James Jeffries Jr. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of children, including Marian Lee Bannister in center wearing light colored dress, bows in hair, and holding flowers, posed in home of Louisa Jefferies, for Bannister's tenth birthday party, another version
